choosePawn(PawnColors) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Controller
The method checks if the gameController is not null (i.e.
choosePawn(PawnColors) - Method in interface it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Interfaces.ControllerInterface
This method is used to choose the pawn color by the player
choosePawn(String, PawnColors) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameController
Method used by the user to choose its pawn color If the chosen color is not available, the player is notified and the prompted to re-choose a color If the player is not in the correct state to choose a pawn, the player the malevolent consequences are triggered If the player chooses the black pawn, the player is marked as malevolent Otherwise the model is updated with the chosen color, the player is moved to the wait state, waiting for the other players to choose their pawn and game is saved on disk Logs the event on the server The chooser view and the other players are notified of the choice If all the players have chosen their pawn, the game moves to the secret objective phase
choosePawn(String, PawnColors) - Method in interface it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Interfaces.GameControllerInterface
This method is used to choose the pawn color by the player it sets the pawn color chosen by the player in the model it notifies the players views of the successful choice If the player has already chosen a pawn color or the color is not valid, the player will be considered malevolent and notified If the pawn chosen is already taken, the player will be notified and repeated the choice If the player choosing is the last one to choose the game will progress to the next state i.e.
chooseSecretObjective(LightCard) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.connectionLayer.RMI.VirtualRMI.VirtualControllerRMI
Call the chooseSecretObjective method of the controller on the server.

The method checks if the gameController is not null (i.e.
chooseSecretObjective(LightCard) - Method in interface it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Interfaces.ControllerInterface
This method is used to choose the secret objective card by the player
chooseSecretObjective(String, LightCard) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameController
Method used to choose the secret objective card of the player If the chosen card is not valid or the player isn't in the correct state, the player is marked as malevolent Otherwise the model is updated with the chosen card, the player is moved to the wait state, the player choosing it is notified of the choice and its view updated, and the other players are notified of the choice If all the players have chosen their secret objective, the game moves to the actual game phase and the game is saved on disk Logs the event on the server
chooseSecretObjective(String, LightCard) - Method in interface it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Interfaces.GameControllerInterface
This method is used to choose the secret objective card by the player it sets the secret objective card chosen by the player in the model it notifies the players views of the successful choice If the player has already chosen a secret objective card or the card is not valid, the player will be considered malevolent and notified If the player choosing is the last one to choose the game will progress to the next state i.e.
